text: A + E Networks has set a first - look development pact with Leah Remini and renewed her “ Scientology and the Aftermath ” docu - series for a third season. The production deal comes on the heels of A + E ’ s launch of an unscripted production unit dubbed A + E Originals. The plan is for Remini to develop a range of documentary content, beyond the subject of Scientology, for A & E, Lifetime, History and other in - house A + E platforms. “ I am so incredibly proud of this show and the movement that has started around it which continues to grow each and every day, ” said Remini. “ I ’ m honored to have a home at A + E Networks and am grateful and humbled to have the opportunity to expand our relationship telling brave stories and bringing truth
